price: Sema: Asaa ni karibu kukufikieni sehemu ya yale mnayo yahimiza.
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Sema: Huenda ikakukuteni, na imekukaribieni baadhi ya adhabu mnayo ihimiza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
